name: Potato Sausage Casserole
author: Clara H. Essner

ingredients.name: c. sliced and peeled raw potatoes

instructions: Brown sausage, drain and set aside. Combine soup, milk, onion, salt and pepper. In a greased 2 quart casserole, layer half of the potatoes, half of the soup mixture and half of the sausage. Repeat, ending with sausage. Cover and bake at 350Â° for 1 hour or until potatoes are tender. Sprinkle with cheese. Return to oven uncovered for 2 or 3 minutes. Garnish with parsley if desired.
